enable_output.description: Enables or disables an output port.

enabled.description: Indicate if port should be enabled or not.
enabled.name: Enabled

enable_output.name: Enable output

menu_cursor.description: Controls the cursor in a menu.

cursor.description: Name of the cursor key to press ('up', 'down', 'left', 'right', 'select', 'return').
cursor.name: Cursor

menu_cursor.name: Menu cursor

select_scene.description: Selects a scene on the receiver.

scene.description: Name of the scene. Standard for RX-V437 is 'BD/DVD Movie Viewing', 'TV Viewing', 'NET Audio Listening' or 'Radio Listening'.
scene.name: Scene

select_scene.name: Select scene
